Subject: Definitions question

We're having some "robust" discussions about testing here and one of the bi=
g issues concerns correct nomenclature for testing types and levels and sco=
pes. Does anyone have any book recommendations to help with industry accept=
ed terms and definitions? I have seen references to "The Art of Software Te=
sting" by Glenford Myers that describe it as the seminal work on the matter=
. Is that book worth getting? Is there a website anywhere that has "standar=
d" definitions that my co-workers and I can use for enlightenment on this m=
atter?

All wisdom on this matter will be greatly appreciated.

Simon
